sentences.sentence: Serve drained and cut into thin slices. Used in salads, as a topping for pizzas or bruschetta or in baked pasta dishes.
sentences.translation: 沥干后食用，并切成薄片，可运用在沙拉中，当比萨或义大利香蒜面包上面的配料或用于烘烤类意大利面食里。

sentences.sentence: "It's creative, interesting Italian, " he said. "In the summer they get a lot of great fresh vegetables and probably have the best tomato bruschetta I've had.
sentences.translation: “是很有创意，很美味的意大利菜，”他说，“夏天有很多新鲜蔬菜，番茄烤面包片可能是我生平吃过最棒的。”
